text: * Name - only information kept in human-readable form * ldentifier — unique tag (number) identifies file within file system * Type — needed for systems that support different types * Location — pointer to file location on device * Size - current file size * Protection — controls who can do reading, writing, executing * Time, date, and user identification — data for protection, security, and usage monitoring * Information about files are kept in the directory structure, which is maintained on the disk
